channel.title: hyperparameter tuning on ps126.5
channel.description: Recent content in hyperparameter tuning on ps126.5

item.title: Improving Deep Neural Networks m2w1
item.description: Train / dev / test sets Previously: Train: Test = 70% : 30% Train : dev : test = 60% : 20% : 20% However, in the big data era where you have more than 1 million sets Train : dev : test = 1,000,000 : 10,000 : 10,000 Train : dev : test = 99.5% : 0.25% : 0.25% Train : dev : test = 99.5% : 0.
